messages

Class PermissionMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • messages.Message
      • messages.PermissionMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PermissionMessage
extends Message
    Version:
    1.0 This class represents the message to exchange when to verify the permissions of a block of shared files and folders
    Author:
    Clash of Devs
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        command - Represents the command of the message
        pathname - String that represents the pathname of the node.

      • PermissionMessage

        public PermissionMessage(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.String command,
                         java.lang.String pathname,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> emails,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> editable)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor for PermissionMessage with list of emails of every user being shared the specified node and list of permissions of every user being shared
        Parameters:
        username - String that represents the username of the client
        password - String that represents the password of the client
        command - Represents the command of the message
        pathname - String that represents the pathname of the node.
        emails - List of strings that contains the email of the users that are being shared the specified node
        editable - List of booleans representing the permissions given to every user being shared the specified node
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws exception on error.
